synopsis.text: Nattsu, Basil, Clove, Jasmine, Lime, and Cinnamon, along with the spirited Sandy and her talkative, sheep-like companion Cloud, form an unconventional yet captivating news reporter team in this animated series. With their distinct hair colors and diverse fashion choices, these seven friends embark on thrilling adventures, exploring their world and uncovering newsworthy stories. Each episode presents the group in various outfits, reflecting their unique personalities and the diverse range of experiences they encounter. Prepare for a delightful blend of friendship, fun, and journalistic pursuits in this engaging anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
